text: Vila Boa may refer to the following places: ==Brazil== * Vila Boa, Goiás, a municipality in the State of Goiás ==Portugal== * Vila Boa (Barcelos), a civil parish in the municipality of Barcelos * Vila Boa (Mirandela), a civil parish in the municipality of Mirandela * Vila Boa (Sabugal), a civil parish in the municipality of Sabugal ;Other variants: * Vila Boa de Ousilhão, a parish in the municipality of Vinhais * Vila Boa de Quires, a parish in the municipality of Marco de Canaveses * Vila Boa do Bispo, a parish in the municipality of Marco de Canaveses * Vila Boa do Mondego, a parish in the municipality of Celorico da Beira
title: Vila Boa
